Ah another which is better sub or dub? Actually the DVDs I'm pretty 
sure will come with both the Japanese/English audio. Every anime that 
I have bought has been like that (exclude the hongkong/pirate 
versions on this). Actually it's quite a treat to watch in pure 
Nihonggo goodness without the subtitles, it's amazing how much I 
missed when I was watching the fansubs.

Anywho.... Dub very few have been done decently. The only one I can 
pick out as a relatively good dub was the Big O. Kenshin DVDs 
themselve, the english version killed me. My expectations for a good 
dub is not high... 

~wounds


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...> 
wrote:
